sheetQuery.byCounty:
select t.areaid, t.areaname, t.shebeiliang, t.baozhang_num, t.guijiqueren_num, decode(t.shebeiliang, 0, 0, round(t.guijiqueren_num / t.shebeiliang * 100, 2)) as guzhanglv, --故障率 decode(t.guijiqueren_num, 0, 0, round(t.guzhanglishi / t.guijiqueren_num, 2)) as avg_guzhanglishi, -- 平均故障历时 decode(t.gk_guijiqueren_num, 0, 0, round(t.gk_paidanshichang / t.gk_guijiqueren_num, 2)) as gk_avg_paidanshichang, -- 公客平均派单时长 t.guzhangchongxiushu, decode(t.baozhang_num, 0, 0, round(t.guzhangchongxiushu / t.baozhang_num * 100, 2)) as guzhangchongxiulv, t.cailiaojine, t.guzhanglishi, --故障历时 t.gk_paidanshichang, --公客派单时长 t.gk_guijiqueren_num, --公客归集确认数 t.gk_yxfcs_num as chaoshigongdanshu, --超时工单数 decode(t.guijiqueren_num, 0, 0, round((t.guijiqueren_num - t.gk_yxfcs_num) / t.guijiqueren_num * 100, 2)) as guzhangxiufujishilv --故障修复及时率 from (select ta.areaid, ta.areaname, nvl(t1.equipment_num, 0) as shebeiliang, --光缆线路设备量 nvl(t2.qx_num,0) + nvl(t4.gk_wgj_num,0) + nvl(t5.gk_child_num,0) as baozhang_num, --报障工单数 nvl(t2.qx_num,0) + nvl(t3.gk_main_num,0) + nvl(t4.gk_wgj_num,0) as guijiqueren_num, --归集确认故障数 nvl(t2.qx_gzls,0) + nvl(t3.gk_main_gzls,0) + nvl(t4.gk_wgj_gzls,0) as guzhanglishi, -- 故障历时 nvl(t3.gk_main_pdsc,0) + nvl(t4.gk_wgj_pdsc,0) as gk_paidanshichang, -- 公客派单时长 nvl(t3.gk_main_num,0) + nvl(t4.gk_wgj_num,0) as gk_guijiqueren_num, -- 公客归集确认数 nvl(t2.qx_clje,0) + nvl(t3.gk_main_clje,0) + nvl(t4.gk_wgj_clje,0) as cailiaojine, -- 材料金额 nvl(t6.gk_wgj_ztcxs,0) + nvl(t7.gk_child_ztcxs,0) + nvl(t8.gk_wgj_tyyhs,0) as guzhangchongxiushu, --故障重修数 nvl(t9.gk_main_yxfcs_num,0) + nvl(t10.gk_wgj_yxfcs_num,0) as gk_yxfcs_num --已修复超时故障工单数 from taw_system_area ta, (select c.areaid, c.equipment_num from pnr_optical_cable_lines_num c where c.parentareaid = '28') t1, --光缆线路设备量 (select a.areaid, count(m.process_instance_id) as qx_num, nvl(sum((m.third_send_time - m.send_time) * 24), 0) as qx_gzls, sum(nvl(m.worker_project_amount, 0)) as qx_clje from taw_system_area a, pnr_act_transfer_office_main m where a.areaid = m.country and a.@parentareaid@ and THEMEINTERFACE = 'transferOffice' and m.task_def_key in ('acheck', 'twoSpotChecks', 'auditReport', 'archive') and exists (select 1 from pnr_act_transfer_office_handle l where l.process_instance_id = m.process_instance_id and l.FAULT_TYPE = '10123190101') and @send_time@ group by a.areaid) t2, ---抢修工单数：（施工队回单的，故障类） (select a.areaid, count(m.process_instance_id) as gk_main_num, nvl(sum((m.last_reply_time - m.send_time) * 24), 0) as gk_main_gzls, nvl(sum((m.send_time - m.create_time) * 24), 0) as gk_main_pdsc, sum(nvl(m.worker_project_amount, 0)) as gk_main_clje from taw_system_area a, pnr_act_transfer_office_main m where a.areaid = m.country and a.@parentareaid@ and THEMEINTERFACE = 'maleGuest' and m.task_def_key in ('acheck', 'twoSpotChecks', 'auditReport', 'archive') and exists (select 1 from pnr_act_transfer_office_handle l where l.process_instance_id = m.process_instance_id and l.FAULT_TYPE = '10123190101') and @send_time@ and m.male_guest_state = '1' group by a.areaid) t3, --- 公客主工单数 (select a.areaid, count(m.process_instance_id) as gk_wgj_num, nvl(sum((m.last_reply_time - m.send_time) * 24), 0) as gk_wgj_gzls, nvl(sum((m.send_time - m.create_time) * 24), 0) as gk_wgj_pdsc, sum(nvl(m.worker_project_amount, 0)) as gk_wgj_clje from taw_system_area a, pnr_act_transfer_office_main m where a.areaid = m.country and a.@parentareaid@ and THEMEINTERFACE = 'maleGuest' and m.task_def_key in ('acheck', 'twoSpotChecks', 'auditReport', 'archive') and exists (select 1 from pnr_act_transfer_office_handle l where l.process_instance_id = m.process_instance_id and l.FAULT_TYPE = '10123190101') and @send_time@ and nvl(m.male_guest_state, '0') in ('0', '3') group by a.areaid) t4, --公客未归集工单 (select a.areaid, count(m.process_instance_id) as gk_child_num from taw_system_area a, pnr_act_transfer_office_main m where a.areaid = m.country and a.@parentareaid@ and THEMEINTERFACE = 'maleGuest' and m.task_def_key = 'auditor' and exists (select 1 from pnr_act_transfer_office_handle l where l.process_instance_id = m.parent_process_instance_id and l.FAULT_TYPE = '10123190101') and @send_time@ and m.male_guest_state = '2' group by a.areaid) t5, --公客子工单 (select a.areaid, count(m.process_instance_id) as gk_wgj_ztcxs from taw_system_area a, pnr_act_transfer_office_main m where a.areaid = m.country and a.@parentareaid@ and THEMEINTERFACE = 'maleGuest' and m.task_def_key in ('acheck', 'twoSpotChecks', 'auditReport', 'archive') and exists (select 1 from pnr_act_transfer_office_handle l where l.process_instance_id = m.process_instance_id and l.FAULT_TYPE = '10123190101') and @send_time@ and nvl(m.male_guest_state, '0') in ('0', '3') and m.theme like '(重修)%' group by a.areaid
) t6, (select a.areaid, count(m.process_instance_id) as gk_child_ztcxs from taw_system_area a, pnr_act_transfer_office_main m where a.areaid = m.country and a.@parentareaid@ and THEMEINTERFACE = 'maleGuest' and m.task_def_key = 'auditor' and exists (select 1 from pnr_act_transfer_office_handle l where l.process_instance_id = m.parent_process_instance_id and l.FAULT_TYPE = '10123190101') and @send_time@ and m.male_guest_state = '2' and m.theme like '(重修)%' group by a.areaid) t7, (select areaid, sum(t_us_num) as gk_wgj_tyyhs from (select areaid, barrier_number, count(process_instance_id) - 1 as t_us_num from (select a.areaid, m.* from taw_system_area a, pnr_act_transfer_office_main m where a.areaid = m.country and a.@parentareaid@ and THEMEINTERFACE = 'maleGuest' and m.task_def_key in ('acheck', 'twoSpotChecks', 'auditReport', 'archive') and exists (select 1 from pnr_act_transfer_office_handle l where l.process_instance_id = m.process_instance_id and l.FAULT_TYPE = '10123190101') and @send_time@ and nvl(m.male_guest_state, '0') in ('0', '3') and barrier_number <> '无' union all select a.areaid, m.* from taw_system_area a, pnr_act_transfer_office_main m where a.areaid = m.country and a.@parentareaid@ and THEMEINTERFACE = 'maleGuest' and m.task_def_key = 'auditor' and exists (select 1 from pnr_act_transfer_office_handle l where l.process_instance_id = m.parent_process_instance_id and l.FAULT_TYPE = '10123190101') and @send_time@ and m.male_guest_state = '2' and barrier_number <> '无' ) group by areaid, barrier_number having count(process_instance_id) > 1) group by areaid) t8, (select a.areaid, count(m.process_instance_id) as gk_main_yxfcs_num from taw_system_area a, pnr_act_transfer_office_main m where a.areaid = m.country and a.@parentareaid@ and themeinterface = 'maleGuest' and m.task_def_key in ('acheck', 'twoSpotChecks', 'auditReport', 'archive') and exists (select 1 from pnr_act_transfer_office_handle l where l.process_instance_id = m.process_instance_id and l.FAULT_TYPE = '10123190101') and @send_time@ and m.male_guest_state = '1' and ((m.last_reply_time - m.send_time) * 24 - 8) > 0 group by a.areaid) t9, (select a.areaid, count(m.process_instance_id) as gk_wgj_yxfcs_num from taw_system_area a, pnr_act_transfer_office_main m where a.areaid = m.country and a.@parentareaid@ and themeinterface = 'maleGuest' and m.task_def_key in ('acheck', 'twoSpotChecks', 'auditReport', 'archive') and exists (select 1 from pnr_act_transfer_office_handle l where l.process_instance_id = m.process_instance_id and l.FAULT_TYPE = '10123190101') and @send_time@ and nvl(m.male_guest_state, '0') in ('0', '3') and ((m.last_reply_time - m.send_time) * 24 - 8) > 0 group by a.areaid) t10 where ta.areaid = t1.areaid(+) and ta.areaid = t2.areaid(+) and ta.areaid = t3.areaid(+) and ta.areaid = t4.areaid(+) and ta.areaid = t5.areaid(+) and ta.areaid = t6.areaid(+) and ta.areaid = t7.areaid(+) and ta.areaid = t8.areaid(+) and ta.areaid = t9.areaid(+) and ta.areaid = t10.areaid(+) and ta.@parentareaid@ order by ta.sort) t
